sentences.en: " I'm old enough to play poker and do something with it.
sentences.cn: “ 我打扑克是老手了,可以玩些花样.

sentences.en: A fight broke out because that scumbag cheated at poker.
sentences.cn: 那个卑鄙小人在玩扑克牌时作弊,因此引起一场打斗.
亚历山大的主要嗜好是打扑克.

sentences.en: Experience counts for a lot in poker.
He ducked in time to save his head from a blow from the poker.
sentences.cn: 他及时低下头，躲过了拨火棍的击打。

sentences.en: He had been showing off for her at the poker table.
sentences.cn: 牌桌上他一直在她面前表现自己。

sentences.en: He soon ran through the money he had won at poker.
sentences.cn: 不久,他就把赌扑克牌赢来的钱花光了.

sentences.en: He swiped me across the shoulder with the poker.
sentences.cn: 他用拨火棍打我的肩膀。

sentences.en: He was cleared out in the poker game.
sentences.cn: 他打扑克牌,把钱都输光了.

sentences.en: His expressions varied from poker-faced to blank.
sentences.cn: 他的表情在一本正经和茫然惶惑之间变幻不定。

sentences.en: In business a poker face can be very useful.
sentences.cn: 生意场上，不动声色会非常有用。

sentences.en: Lon and I play in the same weekly poker game.
sentences.cn: 我和朗每周和同一帮人聚在一起打扑克。

sentences.en: She managed to keep a poker face.

sentences.cn: 那个官员面无表情地听着。

phrases.tran_cn: 一本正经的面容；面无表情的人
扑克室（网络扑克游戏网站）

trans.tran_cn: 拨火铁棒，纸牌，扑克，戳火的人
trans.tran_en: a card game that people usually play for money
